info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024
rating_comment: Great place to stay. Ashraf bhai is very good at communication, took good care of us, definitely recommended!

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Very cooperative host, always supportive and went above and beyond but he has issues with the operatives on the ground. He did his best to make our stay feeling comfortable though. And he is trying his best to improve further which is a great thing.
I would definitely recommend this place to anybody as it’s a great value for money, safe with all amenities around.
Thank you Mr Asraf,

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: The stay in the apartment was extremely comfortable and pleasant. Lots of kitchen appliances for easy cooking. As well as the presence of a market nearby where you can buy any products. The veranda is also a nice bonus. The owner is very polite, caring, a very pleasant person, communication with him was very comfortable. The area is a typical residential area for Dhakas, 7/10 for the area. Apartment 10/10 for its price.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Very responsive and flexible host. He did everything to accommodate me. Even gave me a discount because I was staying for several months.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · August 2023,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment:
The host is very nice and took care of us well.
overall a good place to stay.
However the neighborhood is quite busy but the apartment is nice.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · January 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: It was a good space in the Neighborhood of Thongi. Around the corner is a good restaurant where we ate safely. I mean the neighborhood safely but the food was also neatly made. The accommodation was 4 steps walk and you had to lock 2 doors with a padlock every time. Beds didn't really have a bed frame, so you lay on the floor on a mattress. Despite the situation, they can sleep reasonably well. For the money you don't have to leave it I only found it disturbing for privacy that the landlord regularly entered the apartment and was also often on the shared roof terrace. Maybe we are not used to that and it is a pity that the landlord did not speak a word of English. I would definitely come back because we had to be around Thongi. Thongi we find a too bad neighborhood to stay and then this is a lot better and safer 10 minutes away.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Great

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: This is our 2nd stay here after the pandemic. As always, Mr Ashraf is easy-going and prompt in response, he will text to make sure my stay is comfortable. There's additional security gate and CCTV in the building to ensure safety - which is very much appreciated. The location is convenient to get daily essentials, travel to airport and anywhere in the surban and city. We are looking forward to our next stay here when we travel to Dhaka. Thank you Mr Ashraf and the caretaker!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: The place is highly secured as there is extra gate with lock and security camera is in used. Location is convenient to travel any direction of Dhaka city. The owner and caretaker are very helpful and caring to guests. Highly satisfied and recommended.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2019,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: One of my best stay in Dhaka! The house is well maintained and comfortable for our stay throughout the month. Our host and caretaker always making sure we have the best experience, they are very accommodating! The house comes with high speed wifi and water heater in the bathroom. The friendly neighbourhood is safe and not as bustling as other part of Dhaka, which is great as the noise pollution is kept at a minimal. And of course, the location is easily accessible around the city by Uber and Pathao. We are looking forward to our next stay at Mr. Ashraf's. Thank you!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2019
rating_comment: We had a great time at Ashrafs house. Location is great. Not too far from airport. Lots of shops and restaurants in the area but it's still quiet and peaceful. The apartment is newly built and very modern. The lighting is amazing and spectacular at night. All the amenities required for a long stay are there. The apartment was regularly serviced and spotlessly clean at all times. The apartment is spacious and the furniture is modern and nice and comfortable
